popover.primary: A mastery path focused on stabbin' things
A mastery path focused on survivability which means mor' killin' later
A mastery path focused on buffs and group support, cause everyone has some killin' ta do

data.name: Arm Breaka
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Deals 127 physical damage. Removes 50 Action Points over 5 seconds.

data.name: 'Ave Another One
data.description: Follow 'me Lead will deal an additional 375 physical damage over 5 seconds.

data.name: Big Brawlin'
data.description: Big Swing now Snares for 20% for 5 seconds and Disorients, increasing build times by 20%.

data.name: Big Slash
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: Deals 80 physical damage to targets 25 feet from you, and knocks them back.

data.name: Big Swing
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: You furiously swing your weapon in a wide circle, dealing 73 physical damage to targets within 30 feet and reducing their Strength by 75 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Bring 'Em On
data.description: Whenever you Parry, you immediately put your "Best Plan" in motion.

data.name: Can Youz Hear Me Now?
data.description: Cooldown on Shut Yer Face is reduced by 5 seconds and damage is increased to 438 physical damage

data.name: Can't Hit Me!
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: Increase Block Chance by 50%. While you are channeling, you can move at 60% movement speed. After you block, the attacker takes 175 physical damage.

data.name: Can't Touch Us
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: Group members within 100 feet will gain 200 Action Points and will absorb up to 3000 damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Challenge
data.description: You challenge all opponents in front of you, forcing monsters to attack you. While challenged, your opponents will deal only 70% damage to everyone other than you. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Champion's Challenge
data.description:
Both you and your target are held tightly in place for 10 seconds, and neither one of you can move.
This effect can not be dispelled or broken.

data.name: Changin' Da Plan
data.note: This ability does not trigger the GCD
data.description:
You suddenly realize that you could smash things better with a different plan.

No Plan: You gain Da Good Plan.
Da Good Plan: You gain Da Best Plan.
Da Best Plan: You gain Da Good Plan.

data.name: Clobber
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Slashes for 152 physical damage, and generates extra hate against monsters.

data.name: Da Big Un'
data.note:
Requires Great Weapon
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: A mighty leaping strike with your axe which deals 176 physical damage to all targets 25 feet in front of you.

data.name: Da Biggest!
data.note: Can only have 1 war bellow active.
data.description: A mighty war cry that weakens your foes and gives you their strengths. All your melee attacks gain a 25% chance to randomly steal a 75 ability bonus to stat points from targets within 30 feet of you for 10 seconds. During this time, both you and groupmates within 100 feet will benefit from the stolen stats.

data.name: Da Greenest
data.note: Can only have 1 war bellow active.
data.description: A Waaaghy bellow that raises resistances when hit. Incoming attacks have a 25% chance to increase resistance against that type of damage by 236 for 10 seconds on all group members within 100 feet. Physical damage will increase armour by 618.

data.name: Da Toughest!
data.note: Can only have 1 war bellow active.
data.description: A grand war cry to proclaim yourself da toughest! All your attacks gain a 25% chance to increase your group's wounds by 32 for 10 seconds. Anyone affected will be healed by the amount increased.

data.name: Dat Was Great!
data.description: Increases the duration of "Wot Armor?" by 10 seconds, and will now reduces target's toughness by 75.

data.name: Deafening Bellow!
data.description: All targets within 30 feet of you take 1200 damage and are Silenced, unable to use Magic for 5 seconds.

data.name: Demolishing Strike
data.description: A powerful melee attack reduces your target's armor by 1056 and deals 900 damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Distracting Bellow
data.description: A loud shout that startles your target and all enemies within 30 feet of them, reducing their damage to 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Don't Bother Me None
data.description: Increases your Spirit resistance by 252.

data.name: Down Ya Go
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals 352 physical damage and knocks target down for 3 seconds.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Offense
data.description: You deal 15% more damage and all enemy monsters will hate you 15% less than normal, but your armor is reduced by 33%.

data.name: Follow 'me Lead
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: You batter your target to show the runts how it's done. You deals 127 physical damage and increase your own and your defensive target's Weapon Skill by for 20 seconds.

data.name: Get 'Em
data.description: An encouraging bellow that causes group members within 100 feet to regenerate Action Points 20% faster for 15 seconds.

data.name: Good Wif Shield
data.description: Increases Block Chance by 10% when using a shield.

data.name: Gork Smash!
data.description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 10% when you have a Gud' Plan, and 20% while you have Da' Best Plan.

data.name: Guud at Big Choppin!
data.description: When you are wielding a Greatweapon, your chance to parry is increased by 5% and all damage you deal is increased by 10%.

data.name: Hold The Line!
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description:
You focus your defenses against enemy fire, increasing your chances to dodge and disrupt by 45% for 12 seconds. You will also defend all allies behind you, up to 50 feet away, increasing their chances to dodge and disrupt by 15% as long as they remain at your back. Allies may have this effect stacked on them up to 3 times.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.

data.name: I'm Da Biggest!
data.description: Increases your Wounds by 160.

data.name: Immaculate Defense
data.description: An impressive display of defense which reduces incoming damage by 75% for both you and all group members within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Juggernaut
data.description: You become filled with unstoppable power, removing all snaring, rooting, silencing, and disarming effects.

data.name: Keep It Goin'!
data.description: Increases damage on Da Big Un' to 276 physical damage

data.name: Less Stabbin' Me
data.description: Increases Block and Parry by 5% when you have a Gud' Plan, and 10% while you have Da' Best Plan.

data.name: Lob Choppa
data.description: A basic throwing attack that inflicts 104 physical damage. Has a chance to deal 703 physical damage to a severely wounded target if you are behind them.

data.name: Lookin' For Opp'tunity
data.description: Clobber now removes 6 percentage points from your opponents Morale.

data.name: Loudmouth
data.description: War Bellows (Da Biggest, Da Toughest, Da Greenest) now also deal 225 physical damage to your offensive target.

data.name: Menace
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 100% more than normal on all attacks.

data.name: Mor' Choppin' Dem!
data.description: You put more WAAA into your WAAAAAAAGH! urging your group on. For the next 20 seconds WAAAAAAAGH! will decrease the cooldown of abilities used by your group by 5 seconds. Increases the cooldown of WAAAAAAAGH! to 20 seconds.

data.name: Mor' Hardcore
data.description: Right in Da Jibblies and Ya Missed Me will now knock targets back a medium distance.

data.name: No Choppin' Me
data.description: Follow 'me Lead will also buff all groupmates within 30 feet of the defensive target.

data.name: Not in da face!
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals 202 physical damage. Increases cooldowns on target by 5 seconds for 10 seconds.

data.name: Puddle o Muck
data.description: Deals 1200 damage over 15 seconds to all targets 40 feet in front of you. Affected targets are snared by 40% for 15 seconds.

data.name: Quit Yer Squabblin'
data.description: Every member of your group within 100 feet gains an additional 10% chance to Parry and Dodge for 30 seconds.

data.name: Raze
data.description: Repeatedly attack all enemies in a line in front of you, inflicting 300 damage every second for 3 seconds, up to 65 feet away.

data.name: Right in Da Jibblies
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: Deals 177 physical damage. Causes target to take a 75 ability penalty to Weapon Skill for 20 seconds.

data.name: Rock 'Ard
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Deals 127 physical damage. Activates protective shield that absorbs up to 400 over 5 seconds for group mates within 80ft.

data.name: Rugged
data.description: Increases Toughness by 160

data.name: Save Da Runts
data.note: Only usable on other players
data.description: You defend one of your groupmates and try to take attacks meant for them. As long as you are within 30 feet of them, any damage that they suffer and all hate that they cause will be split evenly between the two of you.

data.name: Savin' Me Hide
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals 202 physical damage. You gain a 75 ability bonus to toughness for 20 seconds. Group members within 100 feet will take only 80% incoming magic damage for the next 4 seconds.

data.name: Shatter Enchantment
data.note: Target must have an Enchantment
data.description: A shattering attack that removes one Enchantment from your enemy and do 122 physical damage.

data.name: Shield Wall
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, your chance to block is almost guaranteed.

data.name: Shut Yer Face
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals 302 physical damage. Silences target for 4 seconds.

data.name: Skull Thumper
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: A pounding blow to your opponent's skull that deals 177 physical damage and for the next 10 seconds their head will ring for 75 corporeal damage whenever they are Critically hit.

data.name: Stab You Gooder
data.description: All of your critical hits will deal 25% more bonus critical damage.

data.name: Stop Hittin' Da Runts
data.description: You gain 40 Action Points whenever one of your War Bellows trigger.

data.name: Taunt
data.description: You enrage your opponent, interrupting any currently building abilities and forcing monsters to attack you. While taunted your opponent will take 30% more damage from your attacks. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: T'ree Hit Combo
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
Requires Great Weapon
data.description: You swing your weapon lots, dealing 213 physical damage every 0.8 seconds for 3 seconds. As Da' Big Boss would say, "Countin' is for Stuntiez."

data.name: Trip 'Em Up
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: You "trip" your opponent by hacking at their legs for 127 physical damage, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Tuffer 'n Nails
data.note:
Requires Shield
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: Deals 152 physical damage. Gain a 618 ability bonus to armor for 20 seconds..

data.name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
data.description: Juggernaut's cooldown is reduced to 20 seconds.

data.name: WAAAAAAAGH!
data.note:
Needs da' Best Plan!!
No Plan after dis!
data.description: Deals 173 Corporeal damage to all targets within 30 feet. Causes enemies to take a 236 ability penalty to Corporeal Resistance for 20 seconds. Groupmates within 100 feet of you will have their auto attack damage increased by 25% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Walk it off!
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet gains 160 Toughness for 30 seconds.

data.name: We'z Bigger
data.note:
Needs da' Gud Plan!
Leads to da' Best Plan!!
data.description: You proclaim your size to Mok, rendering yourself and any of your groupmates within 30ft of you immune to crowd control effects for 3 seconds and reducing damage your group receives by 10%.

data.name: Where You Going?
data.description: You root four enemies within 30 feet of you, preventing them fom moving for 10 seconds. There is a 50% chance of the root breaking with every hit.

data.name: Wot armor?
data.note: Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: You smash your weapon into your target, dealing 109 damage and reducing their armor by 618 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Ya Missed Me
data.note:
Requires Block
Leads to da' Gud Plan!
data.description: Deals 127 undefendable physical damage. Target's physical damage done is reduced to 80% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Yer Nothin
data.description: Deals 1200 damage over 12 seconds to all targets within 30 feet in of you. Affected targets lose 30 seconds of Morale over 12 seconds.

data.name: You Got Nuffin'
data.description: When War Bellows trigger they will now restore 270 health over 10 seconds to your group members within 100 feet of you.

data.name: You Wot?
data.note: Leads to da' Gud plan
data.description: You think you heard someone say something about the size of your weapon. You fly into a rage for 20 seconds dealing 10% more damage. Your armor and resistances increase by 30%, defences by 15%, but when your rage subsides you will move at only 80% movement speed for 10 seconds.

data.name: Youz see me blok' dat'?!
data.description: Whenever you Block an attack you gain 4 percentage points worth of Morale. This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.
